name: Florida Aviation Academy
about: Florida Aviation Academy is a FAA-approved Part 141 flight school with nearly 30 years of aviation training experience. Founded by Captain "Jack" Fitzgerald, a highly accomplished airline pilot, the academy offers accelerated flight training courses that can take students from zero hours to a commercial pilot license in as little as 16 weeks. With a low student-to-instructor ratio and a state-of-the-art facility, Florida Aviation Academy provides in-depth flight and one-on-one ground sessions, ensuring students become proficient and safe pilots. The academy's mission is to present a well-planned program in a structured yet friendly environment, providing the highest quality and safest flight training possible. Florida Aviation Academy is trusted by airlines worldwide for producing accomplished and safe pilots.
